text: Hamlet Mkhitaryan may refer to: * Hamlet Mkhitaryan (footballer, born 1962) or Hamlet Apetnakovich Mkhitaryan (1962–1996), deceased Soviet/Armenian footballer who played as a striker. Father of footballer Henrikh Mkhitaryan * Hamlet Mkhitaryan (footballer, born 1973), or Hamlet Vladimirovich Mkhitaryan, Armenian footballer who plays as a midfielder ==See also== *Mkhitaryan
title: Hamlet Mkhitaryan
